amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt all rules promulgated by the Department of Homeland Security from the provisions of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 112-296 to exempt all rules promulgated by the Department of Homeland Security.

action.text: Amendment (A006) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 247 (Roll no. 886).
